quote.summary: iMotion Automotive Technology Suzhou Co Ltd is a China-based company mainly engaged in the production, research and development and sales of autonomous driving products and solutions. The Companyâ€™s principal businesses include the provision of autonomous driving solutions and products, provision of autonomous driving-related research and development services, and sales of printed circuit boards assembly (PCBA) products. Autonomous driving solutions and products include autonomous driving domain controllers and intelligent front camera products. Autonomous driving-related research and development services include the development of software and hardware for autonomous driving, the development of algorithms and functions for autonomous driving, and functional safety consulting and validation. The Company primarily conducts its businesses in the domestic market.
